product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer with SPF30
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsHSA/FSA eligibleDiscover La Roche Posay's Toleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer with SPF30.
details: DetailsBenefitsMatte Hydrating Face Moisturizer: 48-hour shine-free hydration for oily skin control with SPF 30 for daily sun protectionLightweight moisturizer for Clear, Hydrated Skin: helps reduce the look of visible pores, leaving your skin smooth & refinedOxybenzone Free Sunscreen Moisturizer for Daily Protection: provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection, shielding your skin from sun damage while controlling shineNon comedogenicDermatologist Tested for SafetyKey IngredientsCeramide: lipids naturally found in skin. Help retain moisture and maintain a healthy skin barrierNiacinamide: A form of vitamin B3, a water soluble vitamin. It is widely used in dermatology for its soothing properties, helping restore skin's moisture barrier, and visibly fading skin discolorationsPerlite: known to provide a matte finish on skinSilica: provides a silky feel and soft focus effect. Lightweight and able to absorb a significant amount of oil from skinLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water: sourced in the town of La Roche-Posay in France and a core ingredient in most of La Roche-Posay's products. Contains a unique combination of minerals, trace elements, and a high concentration of selenium, a natural antioxidant.Research Results99% said skin looks/feels hydrated*91% said lightweight on skin*90% said skin looks matte*89% said it visibly reduces pores**LRP Toleriane Double Repair Matte Moisturizer UV SPF30 Consumer Study Topline ResultsItem 2640394How To UseCleanse face, then gently apply the moisutrizer on your face and neck. Use in the morning for sun protection.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Silica, Niacinamide, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Steareth-100, Stearic Acid, Ceramide Np, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Myristic Acid, Perlite, Palmitic Acid, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol (F.I.L. V70052534/1).
how_to_use: Cleanse face, then gently apply the moisutrizer on your face and neck. Use in the morning for sun protection.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I have oily/acne prone skin. I haven't noticed any breakouts, but I feel like this does the opposite of mattefying. It leaves a nice glow in the morning when you first apply it, but then throughout the day I notice my skin getting oily. I feel like I have to blot my face or reapply powder. It's a very nice moisturizer, but not for mattifying skin.

reviews.headline: Buy with caution
reviews.comments: I combination oily skin. I love the body lotion from this brand. This product was new to the market and no reviews here when I purchased. I decided to try it. It moisturizes & mattes really well. But it also has been the cause of my breakouts along my jawline & around my mouth. Had clear skin prior to using this product.

reviews.headline: Pills and broke me out
reviews.comments: This product sheds off my face like im peeling a sunburn all day long and i believe it is causing my near constant breakouts since starting to use it. I have combination skin that leans towards oily so i prefer a matte finish, and the product is very matte, it just does not seem to aborb into my skin well. I will be returning the second bottle i purchased before i realized this product was the culprit

reviews.headline: Pills horribly
reviews.comments: I have oily skin, and this product didn't work for me. Whether I'm wearing makeup or not, it pills horribly near my hairline. It's so thick that it leaves a noticeable white cast if not blended thoroughly. The formula of the original version is much more elegant.

reviews.headline: Oily and Combo Mature Skin Approved
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this from my dermatologist. My first use I knew I was going to love this. It felt hydrating when I put it on. I let it absorb into the skin and then followed up with my make up. It made my make up last all day without the crazy shine that happens around my nose, forehead, and cheek area. Most oil control motorist oysters, make your face feel very dry, but not this one this actually hydrated my skin, but yet controlled the oil on my troubled areas. It allows my tinted moisturizer and other Dewey makeup to look Dewey and not oily  I am such a fan of this product. I will be purchasing over and over.  For reference, I am 45 with oily combination skin. My routine is cleanser, toner, serums, moisturizer   Troublr areas:  fine lines and pores around the nose.

rollup.name: Toleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer with SPF30
